Skill.label: Vulnerability Curse - IF NO CURSE RING (In Chest)

PathOfBuilding.Notes:
IMPORTANT NOTES
BANDITS - Alira early on if you need resistances, otherwise take +2 passives or respec to it later. Pantheons - Brine King + Ralakesh until maps then Solaris + Shakari
LAB ORDER (Norm/Cruel/Merc/Uber) - Arena Challenger / Blood in the Eyes / Gratuitous Violence / Outmatch and Outlast
Frost Blades is your AoE levelling skill to begin with, you switch to Bladestorm as soon as you get it at level 28 after you kill Gravicious. You can stay Bladestorm as long as you like, it's endgame viable and you do not need to switch to Lacerate if you prefer. You should switch to Lacerate after you get a strong one-handed axe (300+ PDPS), ideally you want a corroded + jagged fossil crafted axe but you don't need it to switch to Lacerate.
If you want more survivability the block version of the build is much tankier at the cost of damage and challenger charges.
CLUSTER JEWEL You can socket one just above Resolute Technique, and also one to the bottom right of Iron Grip. There is a cluster jewel passive tree option to see which points you can drop for the extra passives needed.
-----Levelling Frost Blades-----
1+ Double Strike (Single Target) Double Strike - Act 1 - Nessa - Enemy at the Gate Chance to Bleed support - Act 1 - Nessa - Enemy at the Gate
1+ Frost Blades (AoE) Frost Blades - Act 1 - Nessa - Enemy at the Gate
4+ Frost Blades Frost Blades - Act 1 - Nessa - Enemy at the Gate Onslaught Support - Act 1 - Nessa - Mercy Mission Ancestral Call Support - Act 1 - Nessa - Mercy Mission
4+ War Banner War Banner - Act 1 - Nessa - Breaking Some Eggs
4+ Ancestral Protector Ancestral Protector - Act 1 - Nessa - Breaking Some Eggs
8+ Double Strike Double Strike - Act 1 - Nessa - Enemy at the Gate Chance to Bleed support - Act 1 - Nessa - Enemy at the Gate Maim support - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged brute
4 - 10 Dash Dash - Act 1 - Nessa - Breaking Some Eggs
10+ Leap Slam Leap Slam - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged Brute
16+ Auras War Banner - Act 1 - Nessa - Breaking Some Eggs Herald of Purity - Act 2 - Yeena - The Root of the Problem Flesh and Stone - Act 2 - Yeena - The Root of the Problem
16+ Utility Blood Rage - Act 2 - Yeena - The Root of the Problem
18+ Leap Slam Leap Slam - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged Brute Faster Attacks - Act 2 - Yeena - Sharp and Cruel
SWITCH TO BLADESTORM AT 28+
-----Levelling Bladestorm-----
Bladestorm Bladestorm - Act 3 - Siosa - Sever the Right Hand Close Combat Support - Act 2 - Yeena - Sharp and Rage Support - Act 2 - Yeena - Sharp and Cruel Fortify Support - Act 3 - Siosa - A Fixture of Fate Brutality Support - Act 4 - Petarus and Vanja - The Eternal Nightmare Impale Support - Act 3 - Siosa - A Fixture of Fate
Utility/Extra Single Target Vaal Ancestral Warchief - Act 3 - Siosa - Sever the Right Hand Vaal Double Strike - Act 1 - Nessa - Enemy at the Gate Brutality Support - Act 4 - Petarus and Vanja - The Eternal Nightmare Impale Support - Act 3 - Siosa - A Fixture of Fate
Movement Leap Slam - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged Brute Faster Attacks - Act 2 - Yeena - Sharp and Cruel Blood Magic - Act 3 - Siosa - A Fixture of Fate Endurance Charge on Melee Stun - Act 2 - Yeena - Sharp and Cruel
Auras/Buffs War Banner - Act 1 - Nessa - Breaking Some Eggs Problem Blood Rage - Act 2 - Yeena - The Root of the Problem Pride - Act 3 - Clarissa - Lost in Love
Auras/Buffs Flesh and Stone - Act 2 - Yeena - The Root of the Problem Maim support - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged brute
EXTRA SOCKET HERE FOR GOLEM/VULN IF NO CURSE ON HIT Vulnerability - Act 3 - Clarissa - Lost in Love Summon Stone Golem - Act 4 - Petarus and Vanja - Breaking the Seal
38+ Defensive (LINK IN THIS ORDER) Cast When Damage Taken - Act 4 - Petarus and Vanja - The Eternal Nightmare Steelskin - Act 1 - Nessa - Breaking Some Eggs Increased Duration support - Act 3 - Siosa - A Fixture of Fate Vaal Molten Shell - Act 1 - Nessa - Breaking Some Eggs
NOTE ABOUT DEFENSIVE SETUP You need to vaal orb Molten Shell gems until you hit Vaal Molten Shell (25% chance). The Vaal Molten Shell gem must be linked after the Steelskin gem because Cast When Damage Taken will cast in gem link order and you want the Steelskin before so it does not cast Molten Shell which would override Vaal Molten Shell.
-----Lacerate Bleed Endgame----- Lacerate Lacerate - Act 1 - Nessa - The Siren's Cadence Ruthless Support - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged Brute Melee Physical Damage Support - Act 2 - Yeena - Sharp and Cruel Fortify Support - Act 3 - Siosa - A Fixture of Fate Brutality Support - Act 4 - Petarus and Vanja - The Eternal Nightmare Multistrike Support - Act 4 - Petarus and Vanja - The Eternal Nightmare
Utility/Extra Single Target Vaal Ancestral Warchief - Act 3 - Siosa - Sever the Right Hand Vaal Double Strike - Act 1 - Nessa - Enemy at the Gate Brutality Support - Act 4 - Petarus and Vanja - The Eternal Nightmare Melee Physical Damage Support - Act 2 - Yeena - Sharp and Cruel
38+ Defensive (LINK IN THIS ORDER) Cast When Damage Taken - Act 4 - Petarus and Vanja - The Eternal Nightmare Steelskin - Act 1 - Nessa - Breaking Some Eggs Increased Duration support - Act 3 - Siosa - A Fixture of Fate Vaal Molten Shell - Act 1 - Nessa - Breaking Some Eggs
Movement Leap Slam - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged Brute Faster Attacks - Act 2 - Yeena - Sharp and Cruel Blood Magic - Act 3 - Siosa - A Fixture of Fate Endurance Charge on Melee Stun - Act 2 - Yeena - Sharp and Cruel
Auras/Buffs War Banner - Act 1 - Nessa - Breaking Some Eggs Problem Blood Rage - Act 2 - Yeena - The Root of the Problem Pride - Act 3 - Clarissa - Lost in Love
Auras/Buffs Flesh and Stone - Act 2 - Yeena - The Root of the Problem Maim support - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged brute
EXTRA SOCKET HERE FOR GOLEM/VULN IF NO CURSE ON HIT Vulnerability - Act 3 - Clarissa - Lost in Love Summon Stone Golem - Act 4 - Petarus and Vanja - Breaking the Seal
